movies.name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
movies.description: On a quest to find out what happened to his missing brother, a scientist, his nephew and their mountain guide discover a fantastic and dangerous lost world in the center of the earth.

movies.name: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
movies.description: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

movies.name: Smile
movies.description: After witnessing a bizarre, traumatic incident involving a patient, Dr. Rose Cotter starts experiencing frightening occurrences that she can't explain.

movies.name: Smile 2
movies.description: About to embark on a world tour, global pop sensation Skye Riley begins experiencing increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events. Overwhelmed by the escalating horrors and the pressures of fame, Skye is forced to face her past.

movies.name: Zathura: A Space Adventure
movies.description: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the cosmos by a magical board game.

movies.name: Jumanji: The Next Level
movies.description: The gang is back but the game has changed. As they return to rescue one of their own, the players will have to brave parts unknown from arid deserts to snowy mountains, to escape the world's most dangerous game.

movies.name: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
movies.description: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

movies.name: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
movies.description: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.

movies.name: War for the Planet of the Apes
movies.description: After the apes suffer unimaginable losses, Caesar wrestles with his darker instincts and begins his own mythic quest to avenge his kind.

movies.name: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
movies.description: Many years after the reign of Caesar, a young ape goes on a journey that will lead him to question everything he's been taught about the past and make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.

movies.name: Toy Story
movies.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movies.name: Toy Story 2
movies.description: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum artifact.

movies.name: Toy Story 3
movies.description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

movies.name: Toy Story 4
movies.description: When a new toy called Forky joins Woody and the gang, a road trip alongside old and new friends reveals how big the world can be for a toy.

movies.name: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
movies.description: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

movies.name: Wonder Woman
movies.description: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

movies.name: Wonder Woman 1984
movies.description: Diana must contend with a work colleague and businessman, whose desire for extreme wealth sends the world down a path of destruction, after an ancient artifact that grants wishes goes missing.

movies.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
movies.description: Captain Jack Sparrow searches for the trident of Poseidon while being pursued by an undead sea captain and his crew.

movies.name: Ice Age
movies.description: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

movies.name: Ice Age: The Meltdown
movies.description: Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and they must warn everyone and find a way to survive the impending flood.

movies.name: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
movies.description: When Sid the sloth gets abducted by a mother T-Rex, his friends must venture into a hidden underground world to rescue him.

movies.name: Ice Age: Continental Drift
movies.description: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.

movies.name: Ice Age: Collision Course
movies.description: When Scrat's acorn sends an asteroid to Earth, the herd must leave their home to save themselves from the impending doom.

movies.name: Despicable Me
movies.description: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love profoundly changing him.

movies.name: Despicable Me 2
movies.description: When Gru, the former super-villain, is recruited by the Anti-Villain League to help deal with a powerful new super criminal, he must balance his new life with his growing family.

movies.name: Despicable Me 3
movies.description: Gru meets his long-lost charming, cheerful, and more successful twin brother Dru, who wants to team up with him for one last criminal heist.

movies.name: Despicable Me 4
movies.description: Gru and Lucy must go on the run with their family after a new villain emerges, forcing them to leave their home and adapt to a new life.

movies.name: #Alive
movies.description: As a grisly virus rampages a city, a lone man stays locked inside his apartment, digitally cut off from seeking help and desperate to find a way out.

movies.name: Train to Busan
movies.description: While a zombie virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

movies.name: Train to Busan: Peninsula
movies.description: A former soldier and his team battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the wastelands of the Korean Peninsula.

movies.name: Final Destination
movies.description: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.

movies.name: Final Destination 2
movies.description: When Kimberly has a violent premonition of a highway pileup, she blocks the freeway to keep several strangers from being killed. But Death doesn't like being cheated.

movies.name: Final Destination 3
movies.description: A student's premonition of a deadly rollercoaster ride saves her life and a few others, but not from Death itself, which is out to claim those who escaped their fate.

movies.name: Final Destination 4
movies.description: After a young man's premonition of a deadly race-car crash helps saves the lives of his peers, Death sets out to collect those who evaded their end.

movies.name: Final Destination 5
movies.description: Survivors of a suspension-bridge collapse learn there's no way you can cheat Death.

movies.name: Final Destination Bloodlines
movies.description: A new group of people must face Death's design after surviving a catastrophic event.

movies.name: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.name: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the planet of Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their planet.

movies.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

movies.name: Captain America: Civil War
movies.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

movies.name: Doctor Strange
movies.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

movies.name: Spider-Man
movies.description: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful supervillain.

movies.name: Spider-Man 2
movies.description: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

movies.name: Spider-Man 3
movies.description: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

movies.name: The Amazing Spider-Man
movies.description: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

movies.name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
movies.description: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

movies.name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.description: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

movies.name: Spider-Man: Far From Home
movies.description: Following the events of Avengers: Endgame, Spider-Man must step up to take on new threats in a world that has changed forever.

movies.name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

webSeries.name: Loki
webSeries.description: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new series that takes place after the events of Avengers: Endgame.

webSeries.name: Loki 2
webSeries.description: Loki navigates an ever-expanding and increasingly dangerous multiverse in search of Sylvie, Judge Renslayer, Miss Minutes, and the truth of what it means to possess free will and glorious purpose.

webSeries.name: Sweet Tooth
webSeries.description: A boy who is half human and half deer survives in a post-apocalyptic world with other hybrids.

webSeries.name: Sweet Tooth 2
webSeries.description: Gus and his friends continue their journey to find a safe haven while facing new threats in a world that fears hybrids.

webSeries.name: Sweet Tooth 3
webSeries.description: The final chapter of Gus's journey as he uncovers the truth about his origins and the fate of the hybrids.

webSeries.name: Squid Game
webSeries.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits with deadly high stakes.

webSeries.name: Squid Game 2
webSeries.description: The next installment of the deadly survival game with new players and higher stakes.

webSeries.name: Squid Game 3
webSeries.description: The final chapter of the Squid Game saga, revealing the ultimate fate of the players and the masterminds behind the deadly competition.

webSeries.name: The Wheel of Time
webSeries.description: A woman named Moiraine crosses paths with five young villagers, one of whom is prophesied to be the Dragon Reborn, who will either save or destroy humanity.

webSeries.name: The Wheel of Time Season 2
webSeries.description: The Dragon Reborn and his allies face new threats as the world teeters on the brink of war and the Dark One's influence grows.

webSeries.name: The Wheel of Time Season 3
webSeries.description: The battle for the fate of the world intensifies as Rand al'Thor embraces his destiny as the Dragon Reborn.
Passengers on an immigrant ship traveling to the new continent get caught in a mysterious riddle when they find a second vessel adrift on the open sea.

webSeries.name: Moon Knight
webSeries.description: Steven Grant discovers he has dissociative identity disorder and shares a body with mercenary Marc Spector. As enemies converge, he must navigate his complex identities.

webSeries.name: His Dark Materials
webSeries.description: A young girl is destined to liberate her world from the grip of the Magisterium which represses people's ties to magic and their animal spirits known as daemons.

webSeries.name: His Dark Materials Season 2
webSeries.description: Lyra and Will journey through multiple worlds to find Will's father and uncover the truth about Dust.

webSeries.name: His Dark Materials Season 3
webSeries.description: Lyra and Will's journey reaches its climax as they confront the Authority and fight for the future of all worlds.

webSeries.name: Stranger Things
webSeries.description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

webSeries.name: Stranger Things 2
webSeries.description: A year after Will's return, everything seems back to normal—but a darkness lurks just beneath the surface, threatening all of Hawkins.

webSeries.name: Stranger Things 3
webSeries.description: Summer brings new jobs and budding romance, but the Mind Flayer returns to terrorize Hawkins with a new threat.

webSeries.name: Stranger Things 4
webSeries.description: The group faces a terrifying new supernatural threat as secrets about Hawkins and Eleven's past are revealed.

webSeries.name: Alice in Borderland
webSeries.description: An aimless gamer and his friends find themselves in a parallel Tokyo where they must compete in dangerous games to survive.

webSeries.name: Alice in Borderland 2
webSeries.description: Arisu and Usagi continue their fight for survival in the deadly games of Borderland, uncovering dark truths about the world they're trapped in.

webSeries.name: All of Us Are Dead
webSeries.description: A group of students trapped in their high school must fight to survive when a zombie virus breaks out.

webSeries.name: Shadow and Bone
webSeries.description: A young soldier discovers a power that could unite her war-torn world, but dark forces conspire against her.

webSeries.name: Shadow and Bone Season 2
webSeries.description: Alina Starkov continues her journey to destroy the Shadow Fold while facing new enemies and uncovering secrets about her past.

webSeries.name: The Peripheral
webSeries.description: A woman discovers a secret connection to an alternate reality and uncovers a dark future.

webSeries.name: Wednesday
webSeries.description: Wednesday Addams navigates her new school, Nevermore Academy, while solving a supernatural mystery.

webSeries.name: The Last of Us
webSeries.description: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

webSeries.name: The Last of Us Season 2
webSeries.description: The continuation of Joel and Ellie's journey in a post-apocalyptic world, facing new threats and moral dilemmas.

webSeries.name: Sweet Home
webSeries.description: As humans turn into savage monsters, one troubled teenager and his neighbors fight to survive and hold onto their humanity.

webSeries.name: Sweet Home 2
webSeries.description: The survivors continue their battle against monstrous threats while uncovering the truth behind the apocalyptic event.

webSeries.name: Sweet Home 3
webSeries.description: The final chapter of the survivors' struggle against the monstrous apocalypse.
